config.name: [pState {pstate}] Phy clock frequency ratio
config.help: Phy clock frequency ratio DDR4 : Is always 1:2 DDR5 : 1:2, 1:4 LPDDR4: 1:2, 1:4 LPDDR5: WCK:CK 2:1, 4:1
